I think this game is one of the best so far this year, but I have one little problem.

I can run the game with no problem.
It goes fast without lagg or things like that... but then after either 5-10 minutes or later.. it just stops.
I can't move, can't alt-F4, can't alt-tab, or ctrl-alt-delete..... my computer just stands still... then I reboot and all is fine.

Not just this game.. It happened in Bloodlines too, but that's not the same engine.

It is not because I've got no updates (got them all) and my graph-card is new and up to date... just don't know wtf to do.. :(
